abstract: The fortunes of the PC industry are improving, according to Paul Otellini, chief executive of Intel.
snippet: The fortunes of the PC industry are improving, according to Paul Otellini, chief executive of Intel.
lead_paragraph: The current quarter is “a little better than we had expected,” Intel’s chief executive, Paul Otellini, said Tuesday at an event for financial analysts in Santa Clara, Calif.

headline.main: Intel Says Outlook Is ‘a Little Better’ Than Expected
